en: each unit can attack only once a turn
units have own weaknesses and advantages - only troops can capture buildings but they have almost no chance against tanks and tanks can’t attack helis
you can deploy soldiers in HQ but it is cheaper to do so in the barracks
unit losses all his remaining AP in turn when capturing Tower
all production buildings require a soldier to maintain it - capturing them will cost you a soldier unit
HQ and captured Towers or Airports will produce cash in every turn
cash can be spend for deploying units and movement
use your cash wisely - a big army will be slower and less effective than a small squad
it’s never a good idea to send a unit alone to the battlefield
mixing unit types in squads gives you a strategic advantage
you cannot deploy unit when spawning point is blocked and so do the enemy - block factories with your units
units can attack only adjacent tiles - so when target is far away you should firstly move your unit
HQ is the most valuable building in game - if you capture enemy HQ you will win the game
